prompts: Create a cute grass-type Pokemon that resembles a cherry blossom tree with a soft, round shape.
Imagine a flower-themed Pokemon with vibrant colors and a playful personality, perfect for a spring setting.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a blooming flower, with bright petals and a delicate appearance.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon that resembles a small, round fruit, adorned with blooming petals on top.
Show me a tiny Pokemon that looks like a cherry with green leaves, showcasing its joyful nature.
Give me a Pokemon that combines plant and fairy features, appearing as if it's always in bloom.
Make a Pokemon that has a charming floral design, exuding happiness and positivity wherever it goes.
